description: This Python source file provides utility functions for processing uploaded media files, including images, audio, video, and documents, using FastAPI's UploadFile and custom media classes.

methods.name: process_image
methods.description: Processes an uploaded image file, reads its content, and returns an Image object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_audio
methods.description: Processes an uploaded audio file, determines its format from filename or content type, and returns an Audio object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_video
methods.description: Processes an uploaded video file and returns a Video object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_document
methods.description: Processes an uploaded document file, reads its content, and returns a FileMedia object; logs an error and returns None if an exception occurs.
